sql_list.sql_query:
CREATE TABLE sales_demo (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT,    -- Unique identifier for each sale
    product_id INT NOT NULL,                   -- Identifier for the product sold
    customer_id INT NOT NULL,                  -- Identifier for the customer
    quantity INT NOT NULL,                     -- Number of products sold
    sale_date DATE NOT NULL,                   -- Date of the sale
    total_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL       -- Total amount for the sale
);
